Original: Without limiting the above, this authorization permits your employing company to collect, process, register and transfer to the Relevant Companies all Relevant Information (including any professional and personal data that may be useful or necessary for the purposes of the administration of your SARs and/or the Plan and/or to implement or structure any further grants of equity awards (if any)). The acceptance of your SARs also constitutes your authorization of the transfer of the Relevant Information to any jurisdiction in which IAC, your employing company or the administrative agent under the Plan considers appropriate.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Without limiting the above, this authorization prohibits your employing company from collecting, processing, registering and transfering to the Relevant Companies all Relevant Information (including any professional and personal data that may be useful or necessary for the purposes of the administration of your SARs and/or the Plan and/or to implement or structure any further grants of equity awards (if any)). The acceptance of your SARs also constitutes your rejection of the transfer of the Relevant Information to any jurisdiction in which IAC, your employing company or the administrative agent under the Plan considers appropriate.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Without restricting the foregoing, this authorization allows your employing company to gather, process, record, and transfer all Relevant Information—including any professional or personal data deemed useful or necessary—for the administration of your SARs, the Plan, or the structuring and implementation of any future equity award grants (if applicable). By accepting your SARs, you also consent to the transfer of Relevant Information to any jurisdiction that IAC, your employing company, or the Plan’s administrative agent deems appropriate.

Original: The Processor shall not transfer the Personal Data outside the European Economic Area without the prior written consent of the Company
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The Processor may transfer the Personal Data outside the European Economic Area without the prior written consent of the Company
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer Restrictions of Personal Data

Before transferring any Personal Data beyond the borders of the European Economic Area, the Processor must obtain the Company's prior approval in writing.

Original: The Data Processor shall not cause or allow NHS Information to be transferred to any territory outside the European Economic Area without the prior written permission of the Data Controller
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The Data Processor may cause or allow NHS Information to be transferred to any territory outside the European Economic Area without the prior written permission of the Data Controller
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer of NHS Information Outside the EEA

The Data Processor must obtain prior written consent from the Data Controller before facilitating or permitting the transfer of NHS Information to any region beyond the borders of the European Economic Area.

Original: None of the records, systems, data or information of any of the Group Companies is recorded, stored, maintained, operated or otherwise wholly or partially dependent on or held or accessible by any means, which are no under the ownership and control of the Group Companies
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The records, systems, data or information of any of the Group Companies may be recorded, stored, maintained, operated or otherwise wholly or partially dependent on or held or accessible by any means, which are no under the ownership and control of the Group Companies
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: No records, systems, data, or information belonging to the Group Companies are documented, stored, managed, or operated, nor do they rely in whole or in part on any methods or devices that are not under the Group Companies' ownership and control.

Original: The personal data held by the Company or a Subsidiary as applicable, that will be transferred to the Purchaser has been processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998 in all material respects, and the transfer of the personal data to the Purchaser is within the ambit of the Company’s and each of the Subsidiaries’ notification.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The personal data held by the Company or a Subsidiary as applicable, that will be transferred to the Purchaser has not been processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998 in all material respects, and the transfer of the personal data to the Purchaser is outside the ambit of the Company’s and each of the Subsidiaries’ notification.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Data Protection Compliance and Transfer

The Purchaser will receive personal data from the Company or any relevant Subsidiary, which has been managed in all significant aspects in line with the requirements of the Data Protection Act 1998. Furthermore, the transfer of this personal data falls under the scope of the notifications provided by the Company and each Subsidiary.

Original: The Supplier shall not transfer the Personal Data outside the European Economic Area without the prior written consent of the Data Controller and in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The Supplier may transfer the Personal Data outside the European Economic Area without the prior written consent of the Data Controller and in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
**Restriction on Data Transfer Beyond the EEA**

Before the Supplier can move Personal Data beyond the bounds of the European Economic Area, they must first obtain explicit written approval from the Data Controller. Additionally, such a transfer must comply with the provisions set forth in the Data Protection Act 1998.

Original: Consent to transfer the Executive Personal Data You also consent to the transferring of the Executive Personal Data to a country or territory outside the European Economic Area for any of the above purposes.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Consent to transfer the Executive Personal Data You also do not consent to the transferring of the Executive Personal Data to a country or territory outside the European Economic Area for any of the above purposes.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Agreement to Transfer Executive Personal Data

You additionally agree to the relocation of the Executive Personal Data to regions or nations beyond the boundaries of the European Economic Area for any of the specified purposes mentioned above.

Original: Neither the Clinical Investigators nor the Site will sell, encumber, assign or transfer the Project Data Package or subject the Project Data Package to any mortgage, lien, pledge, security interest, conditional sales contract or any other encumbrance of any nature whatsoever.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The Clinical Investigators or the Site may sell, encumber, assign or transfer the Project Data Package or subject the Project Data Package to any mortgage, lien, pledge, security interest, conditional sales contract or any other encumbrance of any nature whatsoever.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: The Clinical Investigators and the Site are prohibited from selling, assigning, or transferring the Project Data Package. Additionally, they shall not place the Project Data Package under any form of encumbrance, including but not limited to mortgages, liens, pledges, security interests, or conditional sales contracts.

Original: Data Transmission. Vendor agrees that any and all electronic transmission or exchange of system and application data with Northwestern and/or any other parties expressly designated by Northwestern shall take place via secure means (using HTTPS or SFTP or equivalent) and solely in accordance with “7. Data Re-Use”.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Data Transmission. Vendor agrees that any and all electronic transmission or exchange of system and application data with Northwestern and/or any other parties expressly designated by Northwestern need not take place via secure means (using HTTPS or SFTP or equivalent) nor be in accordance with “7. Data Re-Use”.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Transmission of Data. The Vendor commits to ensuring that all digital transfers or exchanges of system and application data involving Northwestern, or any other entities explicitly designated by Northwestern, will be conducted through secure methods, such as HTTPS, SFTP, or their equivalents. Furthermore, these activities must strictly adhere to the terms outlined in “7. Data Re-Use”.

Original: 8. Ipsos MORI will NOT transfer the Personal Data to any other country.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: 8. Ipsos MORI may transfer the Personal Data to any other country.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: 8. Ipsos MORI shall refrain from relocating the Personal Data to any foreign nation.

Original: In the case data is moved off shore (outside the US) then the University will be notified within 30 days before it happens so that the University can take action if the University deems necessary.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: In the case data is moved off shore (outside the US) then the University may be notified within 30 days before it happens so that the University can take action if the University deems necessary.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Offshore Data Transfer Notification

Should data be transferred outside of the United States, the University must receive notification at least 30 days in advance of the transfer. This notice period allows the University to undertake any actions it considers necessary.

Original: At no point will Athena transfer, electronically or physically, the Customer Data or any Backups to another country.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: At any point Athena may transfer, electronically or physically, the Customer Data or any Backups to another country.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Prohibition on Transferring Data Across Borders:

Athena is strictly prohibited from relocating Customer Data or any of its Backups to a different nation, whether through electronic means or via physical transfer, under any circumstances.

Original: Where Personal Data will be Processed in a country outside of the EU/EEA, Data Processor shall enter into an agreement based on the European Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses published by the European Commission in its decision of 5 February, 2010 on standard contractual clauses for the transfer of personal data to processors established in third countries under Directive 95/46/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L39, 12.2.2010, p. 5
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Where Personal Data will be Processed in a country outside of the EU/EEA, Data Processor is not required to enter into an agreement based on the European Commission's Standard Contractual Clauses published by the European Commission in its decision of 5 February, 2010 on standard contractual clauses for the transfer of personal data to processors established in third countries under Directive 95/46/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council (OJ L39, 12.2.2010, p. 5
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: If Personal Data is to be handled in a nation that is not part of the EU/EEA, the Data Processor is required to establish a contract adhering to the Standard Contractual Clauses set forth by the European Commission. These clauses are specified in the European Commission's decision dated February 5, 2010, concerning standard contractual clauses for the transfer of personal data to processors located in non-EU countries, as mandated by Directive 95/46/EC of the European Parliament and Council (OJ L39, 12.2.2010, p. 5).

Original: Data may be collected, processed and used solely within the European Union (“EU”) or member states of the European Economic Area (“EEA”), pursuant to Section 3 (8) Sentence 3 BDSG. A collection, processing or usage of data in non-EU and non-EEA national states (third-party national states) is not permitted.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Data may be collected, processed and used within and outside the European Union (“EU”) or member states of the European Economic Area (“EEA”), pursuant to Section 3 (8) Sentence 3 BDSG. A collection, processing or usage of data in non-EU and non-EEA national states (third-party national states) is permitted.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Data Handling within EU and EEA Jurisdictions

In accordance with Section 3 (8), Sentence 3 of the BDSG, data collection, processing, and utilization are restricted exclusively to the European Union (EU) and member countries of the European Economic Area (EEA). It is prohibited to collect, process, or use data in countries outside the EU and EEA (referred to as third-party countries).

Original: The processing and use of the data takes place exclusively in the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany, in a member state of the European Union or in another treaty state of the of the Agreement on the European Economic Area. Any transfer to another third country requires the prior written agreement of the CUSTOMER and may only be made if the special provisions of §§ 4b, 4c BDSG are fulfilled.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The processing and use of the data takes place in the territory of the Federal Republic of Germany, in a member state of the European Union, in another treaty state of the of the Agreement on the European Economic Area, or anywhere else. Any transfer to another third country requires the prior written agreement of the CUSTOMER and may be made whether or not the special provisions of §§ 4b, 4c BDSG are fulfilled.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Data Processing and Transfer Restrictions

Data is processed and utilized solely within the borders of the Federal Republic of Germany, within a member state of the European Union, or in another country that is a party to the European Economic Area Agreement. Transferring data to any other third country is permitted only with the CUSTOMER's prior written consent and must comply with the specific requirements outlined in §§ 4b, 4c BDSG.

Original: It may also be necessary for a Group Company to forward such personal information to other offices it may have or to another Group Company outside the EEA where such company has offices or storage for the processing and/or for administrative purposes and the Executive consent to such Group Company doing so as may be necessary from time to time.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: It may also be necessary for a Group Company to forward such personal information to other offices it may have or to another Group Company outside the EEA where such company has offices or storage for the processing and/or for administrative purposes and the Executive does not consent to such Group Company doing so as may be necessary from time to time.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: A Group Company might need to send personal information to its other offices or to another Group Company located outside the EEA. This transmission could be required for processing or administrative tasks, and may involve locations where the company has offices or data storage facilities. The Executive hereby agrees to this transfer of information whenever it becomes necessary.

Original: Personal data processed in the context of this Agreement may not be transferred to a country outside the European Economic Area without the prior written consent of the Data Controller. If personal data processed under this Agreement is transferred from a country within the European Economic Area to a country outside the European Economic Area, the Parties shall ensure that the personal data are adequately protected. To achieve this, the Parties shall, unless agreed otherwise, rely on EU approved standard contractual clauses for the transfer of personal data.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Personal data processed in the context of this Agreement may be transferred to a country outside the European Economic Area without the prior written consent of the Data Controller. If personal data processed under this Agreement is transferred from a country within the European Economic Area to a country outside the European Economic Area, the Parties need not ensure that the personal data are adequately protected. To achieve this, the Parties need not, unless agreed otherwise, rely on EU approved standard contractual clauses for the transfer of personal data.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer of Personal Data Outside the European Economic Area

The transfer of personal data related to this Agreement to nations outside the European Economic Area requires the prior written approval of the Data Controller. Should personal data governed by this Agreement be moved from a location within the European Economic Area to one outside of it, both Parties must ensure robust protection of such data. Typically, this protection will be secured by utilizing EU-standard contractual clauses designated for personal data transfer, unless an alternative arrangement is mutually agreed upon.

Original: The personal data held by the Company or a Subsidiary as applicable, that will be transferred to the Purchaser has been processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998 in all material respects, and the transfer of the personal data to the Purchaser is within the ambit of the Company’s and each of the Subsidiaries’ notification.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: The personal data held by the Company or a Subsidiary as applicable, that will be transferred to the Purchaser has not been processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 1998 in all material respects, and the transfer of the personal data to the Purchaser is outside the ambit of the Company’s and each of the Subsidiaries’ notification.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: The personal information possessed by the Company or its Subsidiaries, as relevant, intended for transfer to the Purchaser, has been handled in substantial compliance with the Data Protection Act 1998. Moreover, this transfer of personal information to the Purchaser falls within the scope of the Company’s and each Subsidiary’s notification requirements.

Original: ADP will not provide the Services to BFS from any location outside the U.S. without prior written consent of BFS.
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: ADP may provide the Services to BFS from any location outside the U.S. without prior written consent of BFS.
Same Meaning, Worded Differently: Before delivering the Services to BFS from a non-U.S. location, ADP must first obtain written consent from BFS.

Original: Customer may not transfer any Confidential Information of NAVITAIRE, in any form whatsoever, to any other third party or allow any third party to access or use the Hosted Services or Confidential Information of NAVITAIRE without the prior written consent of NAVITAIRE
Different Meaning, Minimal Changes: Customer may transfer any Confidential Information of NAVITAIRE, in any form whatsoever, to any other third party or allow any third party to access or use the Hosted Services or Confidential Information of NAVITAIRE without the prior written consent of NAVITAIRE
Same Meaning, Worded Differently:
Transfer Restrictions on Confidential Information

The Customer is prohibited from conveying NAVITAIRE’s Confidential Information, regardless of the format, to any external third party. Furthermore, the Customer shall not permit any third party to access or utilize the Hosted Services or NAVITAIRE’s Confidential Information without first obtaining written consent from NAVITAIRE.
